description:
Job description
Blyth Academy is a private high school looking for a qualified senior science teacher to join our school team. We are looking for someone who is familiar with the Ontario curriculum and is adept at engaging students in meaningful and creative ways. The ideal candidate will be passionate about teaching and inspiring students.
Responsibilities:

 Design and implement lesson plans, including engaging and educational content
 Establish and maintain a positive classroom environment that encourages learning, creativity, and engagement
 Provide instruction in all areas of Biology and Chemistry
 Use a variety of teaching methods, including hands-on learning, media, interactive games, and extended writing/oral work
 Maintain a safe, clean lab environment and follow all school policies and procedures
 Attend class meetings and trainings, as required
 Attend teacher meetings and trainings, as required
 Run, participate in extracurricular activities, as required

Qualifications:

 Bachelor’s degree in Education, science (chemistry and/or biology) or related field preferred. Related field experience is acceptable.
 Previous experience teaching high school students preferred. A combination of classroom experience and training is required.

Job Types: Part-time, Full-time, Fixed term contractPart-time hours: 35 per week
Salary: $20.00-$45.00 per hour
Schedule:

 Day shift
 Monday to Friday

Ability to commute/relocate:

 Ottawa, ON K1S 3W7: reliably commute or plan to relocate before starting work (required)

Education:

 Bachelor's Degree (required)

Experience:

 teaching: 1 year (preferred)

Work Location: In person
Expected start date: 2023-08-31
